education.institution: Vishwakarma Institute of Information Technology, Pune

projects.name: FarmFin
projects.description: Enhanced financial inclusion for farmers through SMS-based service. Integrated SMS gateway API for sending daily market prices and weekly financial tips. Implemented backend server for scheduling and sending messages.

projects.name: Chunking the Scraped CUDA Documentation
projects.description: Scraped text data from CUDA documentation up to 5 sublevels using BeautifulSoup library. Performed pre-processing operations like data cleaning, data preparation for further implementation. Used LDA algorithm for chunking the scraped data using LDA model in Gensim.

publications.title: ML Algorithms for Predicting Risk of Cardiovascular Disease

certifications.name: TOC - Data Structures and Algorithms using Java
